hero.description: Passionate about building innovative solutions that bridge the gap between technology and human needs. I thrive on solving complex problems through elegant code and creative thinking.

about.title: About Me
about.passionDesc: I am a dedicated software developer with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies. My journey in tech is driven by curiosity and a desire to build tools that make a difference. I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly applications using modern frameworks.
